text: Pas ej Rasul, xud va pajravoni tu rūji xudro ʙa haqgaroī va ixlos ʙa sūi din ʙigardoned. Va hameşa pojdor ʙoş ʙar in dini islom, ki in fitrati ilohī ast, ki Alloh taolo mardumro ʙar on ofaridaast. Digargunī dar ofarinişi Alloh nest. In ast dini ustuvor, ki ʙa rohi mustaqim va ʙa sūi xuşnudii Parvardigori çahonijon va çannati Ū roh menamojad, vale aksari mardum in haqiqatro namedonand, ki dini haq Islom ast, na digar dinho
